Posts.Content: wanting_to_help wrote: My sister just found out today that she has breast cancer she is 34 and has 3 kids. She is starting chemo next week and the doctors are planning on removing both her breasts in the next week or two. Being her sister i have NO idea what i can say or do to help her now or in the future I also dont know how to comfort her kids or to help prepare them for whats to come. Please any tips, thoughts or ideas would be so greatly appreciated.Â  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How do I help my sister??? wanting_to_help wanting_to_help
